column4: if linux is better  then windows why is there no drivers for my printer and why does a 2 min job in win take 1hr in linux?
linux isn't better and windows isn't better.  If your criteria is easy use of a wide variety of printers, then windows is surely better
I can install a printer on linux in three minutes, but that's because I already know how it is done
but, absolutely, if you don't care to know about the internals of the o/s, then for this purpose windows is better.
